dataModel.name: whoCompletedForm
dataModel.description: Who is the authorised person completing this self assessment?

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation1_1
dataModel.description: 1.1	The regional NRM organisation is complying with governance responsibilities according to its statutory/incorporation or other legal obligations, including Work, Health and Safety obligations.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor1_1
dataModel.description: 1.1	The regional NRM organisation is complying with governance responsibilities according to its statutory/incorporation or other legal obligations, including Work, Health and Safety obligations.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation1_2
dataModel.description: 1.2	The regional NRM organisation has a process in place for formally reviewing the performance and composition of the regional NRM organisation’s board of directors.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor1_2
dataModel.description: 1.2	The regional NRM organisation has a process in place for formally reviewing the performance and composition of the regional NRM organisation’s board of directors.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation1_3
dataModel.description: 1.3	The regional NRM organisation has organisational decision making processes that are transparent and communicated regularly with the local community.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor1_3
dataModel.description: 1.3	The regional NRM organisation has organisational decision making processes that are transparent and communicated regularly with the local community.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation1_4
dataModel.description: 1.4	The regional NRM organisation ensures all staff and board of directors demonstrate Indigenous cultural awareness.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor1_4
dataModel.description: 1.4	The regional NRM organisation ensures all staff and board of directors demonstrate Indigenous cultural awareness.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation1_5
dataModel.description: 1.5	The regional NRM organisation has structures and processes in place to regularly communicate organisational and project performance achievements.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor1_5
dataModel.description: 1.5	The regional NRM organisation has structures and processes in place to regularly communicate organisational and project performance achievements.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation1_6
dataModel.description: 1.6	The regional NRM organisation has met all the expected practices and has additional practices in place.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor1_6
dataModel.description: 1.6	The regional NRM organisation has met all the expected practices and has additional practices in place.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation2_1
dataModel.description: 2.1	The regional NRM organisation is complying with financial responsibilities according to its statutory/incorporation or other legal obligations.

dataModel.description: 2.1	The regional NRM organisation is complying with financial responsibilities according to its statutory/incorporation or other legal obligations.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation2_2
dataModel.description: 2.2	The regional NRM organisation is complying with Australian Government NRM contractual obligations for project financial reporting and management, accurately and on time, including acquittal of funding as required.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor2_2
dataModel.description: 2.2	The regional NRM organisation is complying with Australian Government NRM contractual obligations for project financial reporting and management, accurately and on time, including acquittal of funding as required.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation2_3
dataModel.description: 2.3	The regional NRM organisation has annual financial reports that are publicly available.

dataModel.description: 2.3	The regional NRM organisation has annual financial reports that are publicly available.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation2_4
dataModel.description: 2.4	The regional NRM organisation has met all the expected practices and has additional practices in place.

dataModel.description: 2.4	The regional NRM organisation has met all the expected practices and has additional practices in place.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation3_1
dataModel.description: 3.1	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that provides the strategic direction to NRM activity within the region based on best available scientific, economic and social information.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor3_1
dataModel.description: 3.1	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that provides the strategic direction to NRM activity within the region based on best available scientific, economic and social information.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation3_2
dataModel.description: 3.2	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that demonstrates strategic alignment with Australian Government and state/territory NRM policies and priorities.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor3_2
dataModel.description: 3.2	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that demonstrates strategic alignment with Australian Government and state/territory NRM policies and priorities.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation3_3
dataModel.description: 3.3	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that has been developed with comprehensive and documented participation of the local community.

dataModel.name: evidenceFor3_3
dataModel.description: 3.3	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that has been developed with comprehensive and documented participation of the local community.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation3_4

dataModel.description: 3.4	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan with clear priorities, outcomes and activities to achieve those outcomes.

dataModel.name: meetsExpectation3_5

dataModel.description: 3.5	The regional NRM organisation has a regional NRM plan that clearly articulates Indigenous land and sea management aspirations and participation and identifies strategies to implement them.
